thread.title: Drake Bids Goodbye to President Obama Saying "Big up Yaself O."
thread.title_full: Drake Bids Goodbye to President Obama Saying "Big up Yaself O."

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Drake Bids Goodbye to President Obama Saying "Big up Yaself O."
text:
Shortly after the end of President Obama's farewell address tonight, Canadian singer/rapper Drake took to Instagram to pay tribute to the Commander in Chief. The image Drake posted depicted a mash up of Obama and Drake -- which created an interesting portrait to say the least. The humorous face swap was accompanied by a caption that said, "As a Canadian that calls America home for part of the year I will always carry your words and the memory of your time in office with me as inspiration. Big up yaself O." 
As a Canadian that calls America home for part of the year I will always carry your words and the memory of your time in office with me as inspiration. Big up yaself O. 
A photo posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Jan 10, 2017 at 7:20pm PST 

Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
